SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
MARKETING CLOUD GROWTH
Manage Content in Marketing Cloud Growth

Marketing Cloud Growth provides the tools you need to create and store a variety of content to support your marketing efforts. The Content tab, powered by Salesforce CMS, is where you can organize your content in workspaces and folders. When you’re ready to create something new, create or clone and then edit a variety of marketing-specific content types in a consistent editing environment.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Salesforce Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with Marketing Cloud Growth Edition and the Salesforce Message Credits - SMS add-on
Types of Content in Marketing Cloud Growth
Create and manage all your marketing content from your CMS workspace. You can create emails, landing pages, forms, images, and SMS messages for use in Marketing Cloud Growth campaigns.
Marketing Cloud Growth Content Items and Statuses
An item’s status indicates whether the content is ready to use in a campaign. Understand what each status means and how it relates to your marketing campaigns and flows.
Create Content in Marketing Cloud Growth
The content editing experience in Marketing Cloud Growth uses a single design framework so that building marketing content is familiar no matter what you’re creating. The layout and functionality are the same, but after you choose the content type, a curated selection of components appears for you to choose from.
Brand Your Content in Marketing Cloud Growth
Apply a consistent look and feel across all your emails or landing pages. Specify your company’s colors, fonts, text and button styles, and more. These settings extend to all your Marketing Cloud Growth content, keeping your communications on brand.
Create an Email in Marketing Cloud Growth
The content editing experience in Marketing Cloud Growth provides tools that help you build an email, preview and test it, and publish it for use with a campaign. To make significant changes to a published email or to prevent it from sending in a campaign, you can unpublish it.
Create an SMS Message in Marketing Cloud Growth
Create an SMS message for your Marketing Cloud Growth campaigns and reach your customers directly on their mobile devices. Use SMS messaging to promote something new, follow-up on an ongoing transaction, and more.
Create and Publish a Form in Marketing Cloud Growth
To capture user information, create a form and add it as a component on your landing page.
Create a Landing Page in Marketing Cloud Growth
A landing page can provide introductory information, inform people about your brand, or host a form to gather prospect details. To include a form on your landing page, create the form first, and then create its landing page. A draft landing page is available as part of a Sign-Up Form campaign.
